title: Introducing: feeling vibes
content:
Was a little confused when I first watched this debut video from Swedish outfit feeling vibes.

In truth, I can’t decide whether featuring your dad in your first video is the coolest, or least cool thing you can do, but it’s definitely a statement, which I’m always a fan of, and it hardly matters when the track is as good as this song. Keeping info purposefully limited, waves from feeling vibes, a trio from Stockholm, is definitely in the Jai Paul world of inspiration at points – or as the guys themselves describe it, “lo-fi disco”. Here’s hoping we hear plenty more from feeling vibes.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
